ModMetaData.name: Cerebrex Node Rebalance
ModMetaData.author: Antigravity
ModMetaData.description:
Rebalances the Cerebrex Node to be a true endgame reward and adds Archotech contact mechanics.
Features: - Increases Mechanoid Bandwidth to +30 - Increases Mechanoid Work Speed to +50% - Adds "Request Mechanoid Supply Drop" ability (targeted, 45 tile range) - Adds "Orbital Mechanoid Strike" ability (devastating bombardment) - Subjugating the mech hive neutralizes the Mechanoid faction - Quest chain to establish contact with Archotech faction - Build Archotech Relay to communicate with hidden intelligences
Compatible with Combat Extended.
